byline.original: By LIAM STACK and KATIE ROGERS

abstract: Georgia Bureau of Investigation and local university police are searching for suspect behind death of Savannah State University junior Christopher Starks, who was shot on campus.
lead_paragraph: A shooting near the student union killed a student, said the university, which urged witnesses to come forward with information.

headline.main: Student Dies After Savannah State University Shooting
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | South; Georgia: Student Killed on Campus

snippet: A shooting near the student union killed a student, said the university, which urged witnesses to come forward with information.
